mapper.update: update proimg set img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, img_url, user_id, pro_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted from proimg where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
